## Writing {#writing}

<div id="substack-note"></div>

<script>
(function() {
  var API = "https://substack.com/api/v1/reader/feed/profile/186540262?limit=1";
  var HANDLE = "fredmontet";

  fetch(API)
    .then(function(r) { return r.json(); })
    .then(function(data) {
      var items = data.items || [];
      if (!items.length) return;
      var item = items[0];
      var comment = item.comment || {};
      var body = comment.body || "";
      if (!body) return;
      var noteId = item.entity_key || "";
      var ts = (item.context || {}).timestamp || "";
      var dateFmt = "";
      if (ts) {
        var d = new Date(ts);
        dateFmt = d.toLocaleDateString("en-US", { year: "numeric", month: "long", day: "numeric" });
      }
      var url = "https://substack.com/@" + HANDLE + "/note/" + noteId;
      var el = document.getElementById("substack-note");
      el.innerHTML =
        '<div class="thought"><p>' + body + '</p>' +
        '<p>— <a href="' + url + '">Substack Notes</a>' +
        (dateFmt ? ' · ' + dateFmt : '') + '</p></div>';
    })
    .catch(function() {});
})();
</script>

## About {#about}

### Short Bio

I am a computer science researcher with a passion for applying data science to real-world problems, particularly in the context of environmental sustainability. My work focuses on developing innovative solutions that leverage data to optimize energy systems, enhance building efficiency, and contribute to a more sustainable future.
